title: Awakening the Fire
description: Guardian Witch Book OneArianna Calin has sworn to keep the peace in Riverdale. Mostly, the Otherworlders prefer to haunt the Olde Town district—partying at vampire strip clubs, dining in its elegant supper clubs, or hiding in the cliffside caverns along the Mississippi. Being a cop is a tough job, but Ari has a silver dagger, a gun, and a bag of charms against things that prowl the dark streets. She is also a fire witch—a pedigree that comes in handy, since her partner Ryan is only human.When a virtual reality drug hits the streets, people - and Otherworlders - start to die, and an elusive pack of werewolves threatens the status quo. Ari and Ryan are drawn into a web of murder and evil that will lead sworn enemies into a bloody confrontation. While the city simmers around them, only Ari can prevent an all-out supernatural war...
author: Ally Shields
